segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, depicted as a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is partially turned to the viewer, facing left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge, forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She appears totally unaware of the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water pooling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This neglect is honestly quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water must be damaging the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a waste of water, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip and fall in that deepening pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face remains perfectly neutral, focused solely on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
